item.description:
We will be meeting at Dunkin Donuts next to D'Angelo's Route 9 Eastbound due to the fact Tatnuck is not available tonight and either is the Library.

5:00 pm -6:00 pm Join us for dinner before the meeting at Chipotle located Route 9/Lyman St West Bound.

Your Best Life Now by Joel Osteen - reading now

You may still come even if you missed previous meetings. 

Meet for dinner first at ﻿5:00 pm - at Chipotle

﻿6:15 pm - 7:45 pm Reading and Insights - Dunkin Donuts

Spiritual Book Club for Enhancing our Lives  

The purpose of this book club is to read from life-changing books that help to gain insight on ourselves, our relationships and spirituality. These books that have been chosen are designed to give you a new perspective and live a happier more fulfilling life.   

Unlike other book clubs, we read the book together, one or more chapters at a time (no need to read ahead of time unless you miss a meeting).  We then share our insights and perspectives on what was read.  

You can buy the books on your own or get them out of the library. You can usually find used books in good condition on Ebay or valorebooks.com. You may also order a new one from Tatnuck.

We will read one book at a time which could take several months. Once that book is completed, we will move on to the next one from the list below:

  1. A Return to Love - by Marianne Williamson completed
  2. Your Best Life Now - by Joel Osteen - reading now
  3. Listen - by Lynne Robinson - discovering and enhacing your intuition

To get the most out of this book club, it is recommended you try to attend every meeting. 

Below are the days we will be meeting.  Due to the lack of room availability at Tatnuck, there are 3 or 4 times we will be meeting at another location. Please check the website prior to each meeting to see if there are any changes to location or otherwise. Emails will also go out to attendees who have RSVP'd YES to attending.

We will be meeting on some Mondays and some Tuesdays as follows:

  • Tuesday, March 20 - Dunkin Donuts
  • Monday March 26
  • Tuesday, April 3
  • Tuesday, April 10 - Dunkin Donuts
  • Monday, April 16
  • Monday, April 23
  • Monday, April 30
  • Tuesday, May 8
  • Tuesday, May 15 - Dunkin Donuts
  • Monday, May 21
  • Tuesday, May 29
item.name: Spiritual Book Club
